gpioPin.title: GPIO pin
gpioPin.description: The GPIO pin that should be used as input.

throttleTime.title: Throttle time
throttleTime.description: How many milliseconds should another ring be ignored after the doorbell rang last?

glitchTime.title: Glitch time
glitchTime.description: How many milliseconds a change must remain stable for not being considered as a glitch?

negateInput.title: Negate input
negateInput.description: If your circuit is NORMALLY CLOSED, set this to true.

enableOutput.title: Enable output
enableOutput.description: This way you can easily keep your existing doorbell working or attach a buzzer or other component to your PI.

outputGpioPin.title: Output GPIO pin
outputGpioPin.description: The GPIO pin that should be used for output, when the doorbell is ringing.

enableHttpTrigger.title: Enable HTTP webhook
enableHttpTrigger.description: Perform HTTP GET request instead of triggering the doorbell in homekit directly.

httpTriggerUrl.title: Camera plugin URL (webhook)
httpTriggerUrl.description: The URL the HTTP GET request should be performed to.
